title: Must Watch: Monsters vs. Bikes is latest cinematic release masterpiece from Specialized
content:
Specialized just unveiled the new Turbo Kenevo SL, and with it? That would be another launch video with incredible production value more like something you’d find in a Michael Bay film than a bike launch. With a hero that’s sort of a Halo meets Transformers mashup, the Kenevo SL avatar goes up against the trail […]

The post Must Watch: Monsters vs. Bikes is latest cinematic release masterpiece from Specialized appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
